content: materials to make one corner-to-corner washcloth you ll need… - 1 skein of purl soho s picnic cotton 3 100% peruvian pima cotton each skein is 164 yards/ 50 grams approximately 134 yards required - us 4 3 5 mm straight or circular needles 4 - if using straight needles two us 4 double pointed needles 5 for i-cord gauge 26 stitches and 52 row or 26 ridges = 4 inches in garter stitch size finished dimensions approximately 9½ inches square note you may find that your washcloth comes out looking a bit more kite-shaped than square not to worry this is normal and a result of the knit 2 together decreases being slightly looser than the knit front and back increases a good wet-block or steam will do the trick designed for purl soho by jennifer hoverson jahnke 3 https //www purlsoho com/picnic-cotton html 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=888
